trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for a class that is derived from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Fornece suporte de tempo de criação num designer visual para uma classe que deriva de <xref href="System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Typically, when creating a new data source class for hierarchical data and an accompanying designer, you would inherit the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner> class rather than implement the IHierarchicalDataSourceDesigner interface.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, quando criar uma nova classe de origem de dados para dados hierárquicos e um designer associado, teria de herdar o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner>classe em vez de implementar a interface IHierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IHierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.Configure*> method can be called.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IHierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.Configure*>método pode ser chamado.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IHierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.Configure*>

trans-unit.source: The CanConfigure property is used by a design host, such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], to determine whether to display a **Configure** command at design time.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade CanConfigure é utilizada por um anfitrião de design, tais como [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], para determinar se deve apresentar um **configurar** comando no momento da concepção.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the underlying data source has a configuration wizard that can be launched with <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IHierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.Configure*>, otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a origem de dados subjacente tem um Assistente de configuração que pode ser iniciado com <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IHierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.Configure*>, caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IHierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.Configure*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IHierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema*> method can be called.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IHierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema*>método pode ser chamado.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IHierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema*>

trans-unit.source: The CanRefreshSchema property is used by a design host, such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], to determine whether to display a **Refresh Schema** command at design time.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade CanRefreshSchema é utilizada por um anfitrião de design, tais como [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], para determinar se deve apresentar um **atualizar esquema** comando no momento da concepção.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IHierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema*> can be called; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IHierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema*>pode ser chamado; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IHierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema*>

trans-unit.source: Launches the configuration wizard for the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: Inicia o Assistente de configuração para a origem de dados subjacente.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a data source control has changed in some way that affects data-bound controls.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando um controlo de origem de dados foi alterado de alguma forma que afeta os controlos vinculados a dados.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets the named data source view that is associated with the data source control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a vista de origem de dados com nome que estão associada com o controlo de origem de dados.

trans-unit.source: The XPath for the part of the data source to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: O XPath para a parte da origem de dados a obter.

trans-unit.source: The named data source view that is associated with the data source control.
trans-unit.target: A vista de origem de dados com nome que estão associada com os dados de controlo de origem.

trans-unit.source: Refreshes the schema of the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: Atualiza o esquema da origem de dados subjacente.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to suppress events raised while refreshing the schema; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para suprimir os eventos gerados ao atualizar o esquema; caso contrário <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Restores events after calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IHierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.SuppressDataSourceEvents*> method.
trans-unit.target: Restaura eventos depois de chamar o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IHierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.SuppressDataSourceEvents*>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IHierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.SuppressDataSourceEvents*>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the fields or data of the underlying data source have changed.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o campos ou os dados da origem de dados subjacente foram alteradas.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Turns off events in the data source control.
trans-unit.target: Desativa a eventos no controlo da origem de dados.

trans-unit.source: You can restore events with the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IHierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.ResumeDataSourceEvents%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Pode restaurar os eventos com o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IHierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.ResumeDataSourceEvents%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IHierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.ResumeDataSourceEvents%2A>
